pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Binding for the 'Certifiably Optimal RulE ListS (Corels)' Learner // The 'Certifiably Optimal RulE ListS (Corels)' learner by Angelino et al described in arXiv:1704.01701 provides interpretable decision rules with an optimality guarantee, and is made available to R with this package. See the file 'AUTHORS' for a list of copyright holders and contributors.
